value.name: Teachings of Conflict
value.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Conflict is considered reason in the Nation of Pyro.
Rather than avoiding conflict, one should face confrontations head-on. Once the outcome has been made manifest, the path forward should be determined accordingly.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
As a passionate fan of Genius Invokation TCG, Utsil has only one goal in mind: to launch a fierce offensive and win the match in style. Of course, such an aggressive approach clearly doesn't come without its costs...
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Chasca
customize.desc:
"Skyborne Arbiter" Chasca

Grace and power resound, feathered wings skybound.

customize.name: Citlali
customize.desc:
"Obsidian Opalstar" Citlali

The vivid night-wind flows, obsidian reflects the heart.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>
